name: type
description: The type this mapping is for

name: src
description: The source value for this mapping

name: dst
description: The the destination (mapped) value for this mapping.

name: created
description: The timestamp for when the record was created. (TILDA.Mapping)

name: lastUpdated
description: The timestamp for when the record was last updated. (TILDA.Mapping)

name: deleted
description: The timestamp for when the record was deleted. (TILDA.Mapping)
